text: I'm trying to install the latest version of SpecialFunctions.jl. Using Pkg.install gives version 0.10.3, when the latest is 1.2.1. If I try to manually install version 1.2.1, I get "ERROR: Unsatisfiable requirements detected for package Distributions"

elements.text: I'm trying to install the latest version of SpecialFunctions.jl. Using Pkg.install gives version 0.10.3, when the latest is 1.2.1. If I try to manually install version 1.2.1, I get "ERROR: Unsatisfiable requirements detected for package Distributions"

text: seems to be because Gadfly required an old version of Distributions.jl, which required the old version of SpecialFunctions.jl
